ixv-1.value: The legal name of the Company was modified with regard to the Company's IPO and the continuation of the Group with Azelis Group NV as consolidating company.

ixv-7.value: The Group is primarily involved in the distribution of speciality chemical products used in the Life Sciences (Personal Care, Pharma, Food & Health, Animal Nutrition, Specialty Agri/Horti, Homecare & Industrial Cleaning) and Industrial Chemicals Industry (Case, Rubber & Plastic Additives, Lubricants and Metalworking Fluids, and Other).
